sub_topic: The construction of the Heighway dragon curve.
message_1: What is the total length of the Heighway dragon curve after 10 iterations if the initial line segment has a length of 1 unit?
message_2:
The total length of the Heighway dragon curve after n iterations can be calculated using the formula:

Length = Initial length * (2^n) / sqrt(2)

In this case, the initial line segment has a length of 1 unit, and we want to find the total length after 10 iterations. So, n = 10.

Length = 1 * (2^10) / sqrt(2)
Length = 1 * 1024 / 1.41421356

Therefore, the total length of the Heighway dragon curve after 10 iterations is approximately 724.077 units.
